title: #250 - Philosophy Of Samurai
itunes:title: #250 - Philosophy Of Samurai
description: Before Connor runs out the door to get to work, he and Dan manage to sit down for a brief, impassioned chat about the philosophy and culture of Japanese Samurai. Of course, a lot of their information comes from cool movies they like, but there is some concrete info in here from books like Bushido: The Soul of Japan and Hagekure. Hopefully this is interesting to someone besides Dan! Only time will tell!
